price: Hata watakapo ufikia Moto yatawashuhudia masikio yao, na macho yao na ngozi zao kwa waliyo kuwa wakiyatenda.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا مَا جَآءُوهَا شَهِدَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَجُلُودُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Mpaka watakapo ufikilia Moto na wakaulizwa juu ya madhambi waliyo yatenda duniani, na wao wakakataa, yakawashuhudilia masikio yao, na macho yao, na ngozi zao kwa waliyo yatenda wao,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā mā jāūhā shahida ʿalayhim samʿuhum wa-abṣāruhum wajulūduhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
